problem_names:
lemma split_x:
    fixes y
    obtains "y = x" and "y \<notin> S" | "y \<in> S" and "y \<noteq> x" | "y \<notin> S" and "y \<noteq> x"
lemmas below = fun_belowI[OF split_x, where y1 = "\<lambda>x. x"]
lemmas eq = ext[OF split_x, where y1 = "\<lambda>x. x"]

lemma lookup_fix[simp]:
    fixes y and F :: "('a \<Rightarrow> 'b) \<rightarrow> ('a \<Rightarrow> 'b)"
    shows "(fix \<cdot> F) y = (F \<cdot> (fix \<cdot> F)) y"
lemma R_S: "\<And> y. y \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (fix \<cdot> R) y = (e1 \<cdot> (fix \<cdot> (H (fix \<cdot> R)))) y"
lemma R'_S: "\<And> y. y \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (fix \<cdot> R') y = (e1 \<cdot> (fix \<cdot> (H (fix \<cdot> R')))) y"

lemma H_noop:
    fixes \<rho>' \<rho>''
    assumes "\<And> y. y \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> y \<noteq> x \<Longrightarrow> (e1 \<cdot> \<rho>'') y \<sqsubseteq> \<rho>' y"
    shows "H \<rho>' \<cdot> \<rho>'' \<sqsubseteq> \<rho>'"

lemma iterative_override_on:
    shows "fix \<cdot> L = fix \<cdot> R"

lemma iterative_override_on':
    shows "fix \<cdot> L = fix \<cdot>  R'"
translations:
lemma split_x:
    fixes y
    obtains "y = x" and "y \<notin> S" | "y \<in> S" and "y \<noteq> x" | "y \<notin> S" and "y \<noteq> x"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lbrakk>\<lbrakk>y = x; y \<notin> S\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis;
     \<lbrakk>y \<in> S; y \<noteq> x\<rbrakk> \<Longrightarrow> thesis;
     \<lbrakk>y \<notin> S; y \<noteq> x\<rbrakk>
     \<Longrightarrow> thesis\<rbrakk>
    \<Longrightarrow> thesis
lemmas below = fun_belowI[OF split_x, where y1 = "\<lambda>x. x"]
lemmas eq = ext[OF split_x, where y1 = "\<lambda>x. x"]

lemma lookup_fix[simp]:
    fixes y and F :: "('a \<Rightarrow> 'b) \<rightarrow> ('a \<Rightarrow> 'b)"
    shows "(fix \<cdot> F) y = (F \<cdot> (fix \<cdot> F)) y"
lemma R_S: "\<And> y. y \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (fix \<cdot> R) y = (e1 \<cdot> (fix \<cdot> (H (fix \<cdot> R)))) y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y.
       y \<in> S \<Longrightarrow>
       (\<mu> \<rho>'.
           (\<rho> ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> (\<mu> \<rho>''.
     \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
           (x := e2\<cdot>\<rho>'))
        y =
       (e1\<cdot>
        (\<mu> \<rho>''.
            (\<mu> \<rho>'.
                (\<rho> ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> (\<mu> \<rho>''.
          \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
                (x := e2\<cdot>
                      \<rho>')) ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
        y
lemma R'_S: "\<And> y. y \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> (fix \<cdot> R') y = (e1 \<cdot> (fix \<cdot> (H (fix \<cdot> R')))) y"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<And>y.
       y \<in> S \<Longrightarrow>
       (\<mu> \<rho>'.
           (\<rho> ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> (\<mu> \<rho>''.
     \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
           (x := e2\<cdot>
                 (\<mu> \<rho>''.
                     \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>'')))
        y =
       (e1\<cdot>
        (\<mu> \<rho>''.
            (\<mu> \<rho>'.
                (\<rho> ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> (\<mu> \<rho>''.
          \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
                (x := e2\<cdot>
                      (\<mu> \<rho>''.
                          \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>
                \<rho>''))) ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
        y

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<mu> \<rho>''.
        (\<mu> \<rho>'.
            (\<rho> ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> (\<mu> \<rho>''.
      \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
            (x := e2\<cdot>
                  \<rho>')) ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>'') =
    (\<mu> \<rho>'.
        (\<rho> ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> (\<mu> \<rho>''.
  \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
        (x := e2\<cdot>\<rho>'))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<mu> \<rho>''.
        (\<mu> \<rho>'.
            (\<rho> ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> (\<mu> \<rho>''.
      \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
            (x := e2\<cdot>
                  (\<mu> \<rho>''.
                      \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>
            \<rho>''))) ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>'') =
    (\<mu> \<rho>'.
        (\<rho> ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> (\<mu> \<rho>''.
  \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>''))
        (x := e2\<cdot>
              (\<mu> \<rho>''.
                  \<rho>' ++\<^bsub>S\<^esub> e1\<cdot>\<rho>'')))

lemma H_noop:
    fixes \<rho>' \<rho>''
    assumes "\<And> y. y \<in> S \<Longrightarrow> y \<noteq> x \<Longrightarrow> (e1 \<cdot> \<rho>'') y \<sqsubseteq> \<rho>' y"
    shows "H \<rho>' \<cdot> \<rho>'' \<sqsubseteq> \<rho>'"

proof (prove)

  \<Longrightarrow> (e1\<cdot>\<rho>'') ?y \<sqsubseteq> \<rho>' ?y
